member.name: P:BaGet.Core.BaGetOptions.ApiKey
member.summary: The API Key required to authenticate package operations. If empty, package operations do not require authentication.

member.name: P:BaGet.Core.BaGetOptions.PathBase
member.summary: The application root URL for usage in reverse proxy scenarios.

member.name: P:BaGet.Core.BaGetOptions.RunMigrationsAtStartup
member.summary: If enabled, the database will be updated at app startup by running Entity Framework migrations. This is not recommended in production.

member.name: P:BaGet.Core.BaGetOptions.PackageDeletionBehavior
member.summary: How BaGet should interpret package deletion requests.

member.name: P:BaGet.Core.BaGetOptions.AllowPackageOverwrites
member.summary: If enabled, pushing a package that already exists will replace the existing package.

member.name: P:BaGet.Core.BaGetOptions.IsReadOnlyMode
member.summary: If true, disables package pushing, deleting, and re-listing.

member.name: P:BaGet.Core.BaGetOptions.Urls
member.summary: The URLs the BaGet server will use. As per documentation here (Server URLs).

member.name: T:BaGet.Core.BindOptions`1
member.summary: Automatically binds configs to options.

member.name: M:BaGet.Core.BindOptions`1.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration)
member.summary: Automatically bind these configurations to the options.
member.param: The configs to automatically bind to options.

member.name: P:BaGet.Core.FileSystemStorageOptions.Path
member.summary: The path at which content will be stored. Defaults to the same path as the main BaGet executable. This path will be created if it does not exist at startup. Packages will be stored in a subfolder named "packages".

member.name: P:BaGet.Core.MirrorOptions.Enabled
member.summary: If true, packages that aren't found locally will be indexed using the upstream source.

member.name: P:BaGet.Core.MirrorOptions.PackageSource
member.summary: The v3 index that will be mirrored.

member.name: P:BaGet.Core.MirrorOptions.Legacy
member.summary: Whether or not the package source is a v2 package source feed.

member.name: P:BaGet.Core.MirrorOptions.PackageDownloadTimeoutSeconds
member.summary: The time before a download from the package source times out.

member.name: T:BaGet.Core.PackageDeletionBehavior
member.summary: How BaGet should interpret package deletion requests. See: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/nuget/api/package-publish-resource#delete-a-package

member.name: F:BaGet.Core.PackageDeletionBehavior.Unlist
member.summary: Package "deletions" make the package undiscoverable. The package is still restorable by consumers that know its id and version. This is the recommended behavior as it prevents the "left pad" problem.

member.name: F:BaGet.Core.PackageDeletionBehavior.HardDelete
member.summary: Removes the package from the database and storage. Existing consumers will no longer be able to restore the package.

member.name: T:BaGet.Core.DefaultPackageContentService
member.summary: Implements the NuGet Package Content resource. Supports read-through caching. Tracks state in a database () and stores packages using .

member.name: T:BaGet.Core.IPackageContentService
member.summary:
The Package Content resource, used to download NuGet packages and to fetch other metadata.
See: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/nuget/api/package-base-address-resource

member.name: M:BaGet.Core.IPackageContentService.GetPackageVersionsOrNullAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get a package's versions, or null if the package does not exist. See: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/nuget/api/package-base-address-resource#enumerate-package-versions
member.param: The package ID.
A token to cancel the task.
member.returns: The package's versions, or null if the package does not exist.

member.name: M:BaGet.Core.IPackageContentService.GetPackageContentStreamOrNullAsync(System.String,NuGet.Versioning.NuGetVersion,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Download a package, or null if the package does not exist. See: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/nuget/api/package-base-address-resource#download-package-content-nupkg
member.param: The package ID.
The package's version.
A token to cancel the task.
member.returns: The package's content stream, or null if the package does not exist. The stream may not be seekable.

member.name: M:BaGet.Core.IPackageContentService.GetPackageManifestStreamOrNullAsync(System.String,NuGet.Versioning.NuGetVersion,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Download a package's manifest (nuspec), or null if the package does not exist. See: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/nuget/api/package-base-address-resource#download-package-manifest-nuspec
member.param: The package id.
The package's version.
A token to cancel the task.
member.returns: The package's manifest stream, or null if the package does not exist. The stream may not be seekable.

member.name: M:BaGet.Core.IPackageContentService.GetPackageReadmeStreamOrNullAsync(System.String,NuGet.Versioning.NuGetVersion,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Download a package's readme, or null if the package or readme does not exist.
member.param: The package id.
The package's version.
A token to cancel the task.
member.returns: The package's readme stream, or null if the package or readme does not exist. The stream may not be seekable.

member.name: M:BaGet.Core.IPackageContentService.GetPackageIconStreamOrNullAsync(System.String,NuGet.Versioning.NuGetVersion,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Download a package's icon, or null if the package or icon does not exist.
member.param: The package id.
The package's version.
A token to cancel the task.
member.returns: The package's icon stream, or null if the package or icon does not exist. The stream may not be seekable.

member.param: The package's id to lookup
The token to cancel the lookup
member.returns: The package's metadata, or null if the package cannot be found on the configured upstream source.

The package's version

member.name: T:BaGet.Core.IStorageService
member.summary: A low-level storage abstraction.
member.remarks:
This is used to store:
* Packages, through * Symbols, through
This storage abstraction has implementations for disk, Azure Blob Storage, Amazon Web Services S3, and Google Cloud Storage.

member.name: M:BaGet.Core.IStorageService.GetAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get content from storage.
member.param: The content's path.
A token to cancel the task.
member.returns: The path's content or null if the content does not exist.

member.name: M:BaGet.Core.IStorageService.GetDownloadUriAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get a URI that can be used to download the content.
member.param: The content's path.
A token to cancel the task.
member.returns: The content's URI. This may be a local file. Returns null if the content does not exist or if a URI could not be created.

member.name: M:BaGet.Core.IStorageService.PutAsync(System.String,System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Store content into storage.
member.param: The path at which to store the content.
The content to store at the given path.
The type of content that is being stored.
A token to cancel the task.
member.returns: The result of the put operation.

member.name: M:BaGet.Core.IStorageService.DeleteAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Remove content from storage.
member.param: The path to the content to delete.
A token to cancel the task.
member.returns: A task that completes when the content has been deleted.

member.name: T:BaGet.Core.StoragePutResult
member.summary: The result of a operation.

member.name: F:BaGet.Core.StoragePutResult.Conflict
member.summary: The given path is already used to store different content.

member.name: F:BaGet.Core.StoragePutResult.AlreadyExists
member.summary: This content is already stored at the given path.

member.name: F:BaGet.Core.StoragePutResult.Success
member.summary: The content was sucessfully stored.

The portable PDB's Signature GUID followed by its age.

member.name: T:BaGet.Core.NullStorageService
member.summary: A minimal storage implementation, used for advanced scenarios.

member.name: T:BaGet.Core.RequiredIfAttribute
member.summary:
Provides conditional validation based on related property value.
Inspiration: https://stackoverflow.com/a/27666044

member.name: P:BaGet.Core.RequiredIfAttribute.OtherProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the other property name that will be used during validation.

member.name: P:BaGet.Core.RequiredIfAttribute.OtherPropertyDisplayName
member.summary: Gets or sets the display name of the other property.
member.value: The display name of the other property.

member.name: P:BaGet.Core.RequiredIfAttribute.OtherPropertyValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the other property value that will be relevant for validation.

member.name: P:BaGet.Core.RequiredIfAttribute.IsInverted
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether other property's value should match or differ from provided other property's value (default is false).
member.value: true if other property's value validation should be inverted; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: How this works - true: validated property is required when other property doesn't equal provided value - false: validated property is required when other property matches provided value

member.name: P:BaGet.Core.RequiredIfAttribute.RequiresValidationContext
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the attribute requires validation context.
member.returns: true if the attribute requires validation context; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:BaGet.Core.RequiredIfAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The other property.
The other property value.

member.name: M:BaGet.Core.RequiredIfAttribute.FormatErrorMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Applies formatting to an error message, based on the data field where the error occurred.
member.param: The name to include in the formatted message.
member.returns: An instance of the formatted error message.

member.name: M:BaGet.Core.RequiredIfAttribute.IsValid(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationContext)
member.summary: Validates the specified value with respect to the current validation attribute.
member.param: The value to validate.
The context information about the validation operation.
member.returns: An instance of the class.

member.name: T:BaGet.Core.ValidateBaGetOptions`1
member.summary: A configuration that validates options using data annotations.
member.typeparam: The type of options to validate.

member.name: M:BaGet.Core.ValidateBaGetOptions`1.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new validator.
member.param: The option's key in the configuration or appsettings.json file, or null if the options was created from the root configuration.

member.name: T:BaGet.Core.ValidateStartupOptions
member.summary: Validates BaGet's options, used at startup.
